text: <@U040MK408>: hey! Awhile back you posted a link to the upgrading of ember-power-select to use contextual components, I cant seem to find the link do you happen to have it to hand?
i feel I should know the answer to this but … if I wanted to transition to a new route (aka, `/users/new`) and then wanted to set the state of this new model … what’s the best way of doing this?
btw, trying to avoid URL clutter by using queryParams but will do if that’s the best way
you can keep the state on a service object
yeah i guess but that seems a bit awkward; is there no “ember way” for this?
heh, yeah i guess you’re right; params it is then
